android.(Type a brief description of the problem: (Tape yon deskripsyon tou kout nan pwoblèm nan isit la)

android.App conflict. Tap to resolve the problem: Konfli App. Tape rezoud pwoblèm nan

android.Error showing VPN Service dialog: Erè ki montre vpn Sèvis dyalòg
android.Error trying to show the Android 4.0+ VP: Erè ap eseye montre 4.0 a android + dyalòg Sèvis vpn. Sa a pa ta dwe rive kòm li nan yon karakteristik estanda nan android 4.0 +, men aparèy android ou a pa ka sipòte vpn oto-konfigirasyon.
android.Failed starting VPN\nTry again in a mome: Echwe kòmanse vpn Eseye ankò nan yon moman
android.Faster Internet browsing.\nLess video bu: Pi vit entènèt Navigasyon. Mwens videyo tampon. Pi vit downloads.
Hola vpn se dekonekte apre rdemare.
android.Hola can't automatically configure VPN c: Hola pa kapab otomatikman configured koneksyon vpn sou aparèy android ou.
android.Hola can't open VPN connection: Hola pa kapab louvri vpn koneksyon
android.Hola failed to open package: Hola echwe pou pou louvri pake
android.Hola failed to open the sharing options: Hola echwe pou pou louvri pataje opsyon fenèt la.
android.Hola failed to run. Tap to resolve the p: Hola echwe pou pou kouri. Tape rezoud pwoblèm nan
android.Hola is secure and respects your privacy: Hola yo an sekirite epi respekte vi prive ou yo.
android.Hola requires VPN access. In the next sc: Hola requires VPN access. In the next screen press 'I trust this application'. A key icon will appear to show that Hola is working.
android.Hola speeds up my Internet and lets me a: Hola vitès moute sou entènèt mwen an, epi li pèmèt m 'aksè bloke sit
android.Hola was closed by you or another app: Hola te fèmen pa ou menm oswa yon lòt app
Mwen gen konfyans aplikasyon sa a.
android.Insert SD card to enable Hola: Antre SD kat yo ki ap pèmèt Hola
Enstale echwe, %1$s, ki pa ka kouri Hola.
android.Learn about root access: Aprann plis enfòmasyon konsènan aksè rasin
android.No Internet connections... go back and t: Pa gen entènèt koneksyon ... tounen ladan l epi eseye ankò
android.Not enough free space on system partitio: Pa ase gratis espas sou patisyon sistèm nan kouri Hola
android.Not enough free space to run Hola: Pa ase gratis espas nan kouri Hola
android.Note: You need to do this after every de: Remak: Ou bezwen fè sa apre chak rdemare aparèy

android.Remove 'Deny' on Hola in %1$s and retry: Retire 'Refize' sou Hola nan %1$s ak rekoumanse
android.Share it with anyone! If you don't have: Pataje li avèk nenpòt moun ki! Si ou pa gen Hola ankò, li ta dwe mande w enstale - li gratis!
android.Sorry,\nthis site is blocked\nin your co: Padon, se sit sa a bloke nan peyi ou.
android.Stretch your mobile data plan\nand save: Detire mobil ou done plan epi sove 20-30% sou tan.

android.Tap to get app from Play: Tape jwenn app soti nan pyès teyat
android.The unblocker can't run on your device,: The unblocker can't run on your device, you must have root or VPN support.
android.This site can only be viewed\nfrom the U: Sa a kapab sit sèlman kapab wè yo soti nan peyi Etazini.
android.To fix, uninstall Hola and re-install fr: Pou repare, désinstaller Hola ak re-enstale soti nan pyès teyat.
android.You have a Proxy or Ad-Blocker app runni: Ou gen yon proxy oswa Ad-Blocker kouri app, fèmen l oswa itilize Hola nan mòd vpn

extension.(some Hola features are not available on: (Kèk karakteristik Hola yo pa disponib sou vèsyon ou)
extension.Access any site from any country, free: Aksè nenpòt sit ki soti nan nenpòt ki peyi, yo gratis,
extension.Access websites blocked in your country,: Access websites blocked in your country, company or school with Hola! Hola is free and easy to use!

extension.Hola cannot work because another extensi:
Hola cannot work because another extension is controlling your proxy settings.
Please disable other extensions that you think might control your proxy settings such as ad-blockers, other VPN services, etc.
extension.Hola cannot work properly because anothe: Hola pa ka travay byen paske yon lòt ekstansyon se kontwole anviwònman prokurasyon ou. Tanpri enfim ekstansyon lòt ou panse ki ta ka kontwole anviwònman prokurasyon ou a nan ekstansyon (tankou anons blockers-, lòt vpn sèvis, elatriye).
extension.Hola does not work well in Windows 8 mod: Hola pa travay byen nan mòd fenèt 8. Tanpri chanje a mòd Desktop. Klike sou isit la pou enstriksyon
